columns.name: artifact_media_type
columns.description: The artifact media type of the image.

columns.name: image_digest
columns.description: The sha256 digest of the image manifest.

columns.name: image_manifest_media_type
columns.description: The media type of the image manifest.

columns.name: image_pushed_at
columns.description: The date and time, expressed in standard JavaScript date format, at which the current image was pushed to the repository.

columns.name: image_size_in_bytes
columns.description: The size, in bytes, of the image in the repository.

columns.name: last_recorded_pull_time
columns.description: The date and time, expressed in standard JavaScript date format, when Amazon ECR recorded the last image pull.

columns.name: registry_id
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID associated with the registry to which this image belongs.

columns.name: image_scan_findings_summary
columns.description: A summary of the last completed image scan.

columns.name: image_scan_status
columns.description: The current state of the scan.

columns.name: image_tags
columns.description: The list of tags associated with this image.
